entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
